title: Road to Philly Bike Expo 2021: Peter Olivetti Channels His Ancestors
content:
Peter Olivetti has weathered the Covid-19 era with attention to customer service and a do-it-all approach to frame-building. We touched base via email before the Philly Bike Expo to talk cargo bikes, frame-building techniques, and titanium vs. steel. Please enjoy this interview with Peter Olivetti.   Bikerumor.com: What’s your name, your bike brand, and where

The post Road to Philly Bike Expo 2021: Peter Olivetti Channels His Ancestors appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Andrew Marshall
